column4: Hello. Is there a way to restart the internet connection without rebooting the whole computer? (Broadband-Cable, DHCP).
Hello, is it safe to upgrade from Warty to Hoary? I'm concerned about moving to X.org and having X not work.
i think it's pretty safe. i guess you could do some googling for your particular hardware
Ok. I don't have any unusual hardware. I'm google around though.
